name: OYS / 1
description:
Over Your Shoulder (I was looking for the truth)
------
/Mashallah, my grandfather, is the first child in his family like me/
/He was born more than 80 years ago in this village, Jarian in Natanz county, Iran. He was only a kid when he immigrated to Tehran with his mother, after his father died/
/He came back to live in the village once again, when he was around 60. He was always visiting Jarian during his life, but after getting older, he decided to settle in the only place he loves /
-----
35mm photography/ I often walk slow, I like to wait and watch people from behind. A photo from someone’s back is a proof of his/her existence in that time and place. It says nothing more, it shows very few details about that person. Only that they are humans. In OYS, I explore stories of people you don’t see their faces, in between notes
